item.title: Self Driving Car
item.description: Intro # Reading # SAE J3016: Autonomous Car Level # source 1 all human adaptive cruise control, anti-lock braking system, electronic stabilty control hazard-minimizing longitudinal/ lateral control, emergency braking full autonomy under certain condition, but human take control when in danger full autonomy under certain condition, can replace human at some cases fully autonomous Decision making # On-board sensors LIDAR camera GPS/INS odometry(angle) Hierachical Decision Making System Route Planning

item.title: Principles of Microeconomics
item.description: Ch.1 Ten Principles of Economics # Economists normally assume that people are rational. Rational people systemati- cally and purposefully do the best they can to achieve their objectives, given the available opportunities. Rational people know that decisions in life are rarely black and white but usu- ally involve shades of gray most policies aim either to enlarge the economic pie or to change how the pie is divided market failure to refer to a situation in which the market on its own fails to produce an efficient allocation of resources.

item.title: My First Book
item.description: 爸爸请给我荣耀 # 收集金来学點石成金的魔法 # 英雄拯救人类 # 在祠堂给國家刻一个碑 #
